content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a burner inserter at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5) with a fluid box containing water and a connection to a pipe group.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and a connection to a pipe group.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5) with no input liquid and no fluid present in connections.

### Pipe Groups
Consists of two pipe groups, one with fluid system 142794 and the other with fluid system 142796, connecting the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine.

### Electricity Group
Consists of an electricity group with id 576328 and a small electric pole at position (119.5, -30.5).

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect pipes.
- Check that the pipe connections are valid and not blocked by other entities.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity.
- Check that the entity can be placed at the target position.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has fuel and is not waiting for source items or space in destination.
- Check that the inserter is properly connected to the entities it is trying to interact with.

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel and is properly connected to the steam engine.
- Check that the steam engine has input liquid and fluid present in connections.

# NAMESPACE
### Utility Functions
- connect_entities: connects two entities with a pipe.
- get_entity_position: gets the position of an entity.
- get_entity_status: gets the status of an entity.

### Important Variables
- entities: a list of entities on the map.
- inventory: the current inventory of the agent.
- position: the current position of the agent.
- fuel: the current fuel of an entity.
- status: the current status of an entity.
